item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple aims to source all US iPhones from India in pivot away from China
2. Trump claims to have received call from Xi and to have cut ‘200 deals’ on trade
3. Brussels rebuffs UK bid to prise open access to EU single market
4. US judge arrested in escalation of immigration crackdown
5. Child abuse scandal engulfs French prime minister
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
